mountain_top.description: You are on the top of a mountain. In the distance a small building can be seen. All around you is dense forest. A road leads north.

raised_path.description: You are on the road, a small raised path leads east, the road runs north-south.

end_of_road.description: You are at the end of a road, outside a building. All around is forest.

forge.description: You are in the building, obviously an old blacksmith's forge.

narrow_path.description: You are on a narrow path which seems to descend to the east.

valley_of_doom.description: You are in the valley of doom. The path disappears down a small shaft here. Strange echoes can be heard from below.

hall_of_spirits.description: You are in the hall of spirits. Ghostly laughs and howls can be heard echoing around the walls. The air is full of dust and cobwebs.
